participant_1.name: Sophia
participant_1.personality: Sofia is a creative and nurturing individual who loves exploring new perspectives through her photography. She's patient and enjoys sharing her passion with others.
participant_1.background: i'm interested in photography and like taking pictures. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. i am an elementary school teacher. i am fluent in english spanish and french.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is adventurous and sociable, enjoying the company of his dogs and friends. He is open-minded and values freedom in relationships.
participant_2.background: i've three dogs. i like to watch the olympics. i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i also have a dog walking business. my father was a door to door salesman.
